Title: "Two Men Jailed for Stealing £4.8m Gold Toilet"
Two men from Oxford have been sent to prison for stealing a £4.8m gold toilet from an art exhibition at Blenheim Palace in 2019. The toilet, made of 18-carat solid gold, was taken just hours after a launch party. James Sheen, 40, and Michael Jones, 39, were found guilty of the crime. Sheen was given a four-year sentence, while Jones was given two years and three months.
The thieves broke into the palace and ripped out the toilet, which ...
